comments.body: Why did you do a premine and then create a mining schedule that mines half of the supply in the first 2 months? Is this a joke? There's 0 reason for this type of mining schedule unless the sole purpose is to create a p&d. Nothing about this technology screams "HUGE DEMAND". Nice try though, may be you scam some kids but the smart ones will know to stay away.Quote from: BLOCX. on July 20, 2023, 04:30:33 PMBLOCX. comments.body: Hi, We've added BlocX (BLOCX) to http://zpool.ca/algo/x11. See below for connection details.Fee only: 1% or lessBTC payouts are processed once a day for balances above 0.0015Payouts for all other currencies are made automatically every 4 hours for balances above 0.05 and balances more than 0.0125 are included in one of the payouts each day.- Sample configurations -To mine x11 and get paid in BLOCX:Code:-a x11 -o stratum+tcp://x11.mine.zpool.ca:3533 -u BLOCX_ADDRESS -p c=BLOCX Exchange to BTC:Code:-a x11 -o stratum+tcp://x11.mine.zpool.ca:3533 -u BTC_ADDRESS -p c=BTCAll of our ports are NiceHash friendly, no need to specify any extra detailsSSL/TLS is available for all ports.
